original_title: Diary of a Teenage Smoker: Why Girls Start Smoking and How They Quit
overview: Designed to entertain, startle and inspire a commitment to being smoke-free. This film explores the "image" that allures young girls to start smoking and uses rock music, humor and slick pacing to reach its teenage audience.
title: Diary of a Teenage Smoker: Why Girls Start Smoking and How They Quit
